trans-unit.source: Provides theme settings to <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> objects.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The CompositeDesignerTheme class controls the look and feel of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> object on a workflow design surface.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> to associate with the composite designer theme.
Gets or sets a value that determines the shape that appears at the end of a connector.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> enumeration value that defines the shape that appears at the end of the connector.
The default value is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the connector.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object that contains information about the height and width of the connector.
Gets or sets a value that determines the shape that appears at the beginning of a connector.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> enumeration value that defines the shape that appears at the beginning of the connector.
The default value is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the expand button on the composite activity designer.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object that contains information about the height and width of the expand button on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Retrieves a brush that defines the background display properties of the expand button on the composite activity designer.

If the background brush for the expand button is not set to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) before GetExpandButtonBackgroundBrush is called, the method disposes of the previous brush and creates a new one.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds of the expand button on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.

A object that uses the rectangle parameter to define the button area in which the brush applies two colors in a linear gradient from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the expand button.
Performs further initialization tasks beyond those provided by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> property is set to `true`, the Initialize method obtains settings for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> object from the operating system.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> object that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.

When this method is called it sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value which the composite designer theme should now use.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the composite designer theme will display drop shadows around the composite activity designer.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme"></xref> displays drop shadows around the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the alignment of the watermark image in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that indicates where in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> the watermark image will be placed.
The default value is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref>.
Gets the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) this property will provide the image for the watermark.
If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property is set to a valid value, this property is set to `null` (`Nothing`).
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object to use as the watermark for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Gets or sets the relative path to the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.
A string value that represents the relative path to the watermark image to use on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
